msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Making a performance change in MobileIconItemRenderer/MobileItemRenderer in how we measure text.  We don't call UIComponent.measureText() anymore as that creates another TextField behind the scenes and changes its text.  Instead we now just ask for the textWidth/textHeight of the TextField we are already using.  This change should give us about a 10-15% improvement.  I added a FIXME to change it in ButtonSkin and look for other places we need to change it as well.
Also, I'm making some changes in the way we measure FPS in TestHelper for RadioStations to be more consistent.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
- Making some of the member variables protected for easier subclassing
- Fixing up some issues when using textAlign
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

SDK-27686: MobileIconItemRenderer needs to handle null items in the data for message, icon, and label better than it currently does, and it needs to make sure that when encountering a null that a recycled item renderer resets appropriately.

SDK-27371: ListBase now keeps track of when it should play transitions better.  This is a pretty large change in how we deal with transitions, but we are now keeping track of when caret or selection occurs and whether it occurred due to item recycling or not.
Reviewer: Glenn for MIIR change, Hans for ListBase change
Tests run: checkintests, mustella List, ButtonBar, spark/effects/Regression/test/CatalystMatrixTransitions_test, spark/effects/Regression/test/CatalystMatrixSequences_test
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
A bunch of beta fixes for MobileIconItemRenderer.

Renamed headerField/headerFunction to labelField/labelFunction.  There is now no headerStyleName -- only a messageStyleName.  By default if labelField and labelFunction aren't set, then the label property is used (which is what List pushes in to the item renderer based on its own labelField/labelFunction).  To get no label to show up, set labelField to "" (the empty string).
Fixed an issue when dynamically setting/resetting the decoratorClass.
Fixed some icon measurement issues and some other issues where width/height were getting set to NaN at one point.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

- Modified the Scroller algorithm used in calculating the scrollAnchorPoint (the point where the scroll starts).  Now instead of using the mouseEvent coordinates where the threshold was crossed, we now calculate the threshold and use that instead.  In practice, a user probably wouldn't notice this much (unless there was a big delay between MouseMoves for some reason). However, this calculation is the right thing to do, and will help produce more consistent results with regards to QE and programatically faking the mouse events.
- Removed a FIXME that no longer applied since MobileIconItemRenderer.subText was already renamed to MobileIconItemRenderer.message.
- Modified GetTimerUtil for QE to use fakeTime instead of getTimerFunction().
QE notes: Modified GetTimerUtil so it now uses fakeTime instead of getTimerFunction()
